user.title: Microsoft Family Safety Authentication
user.description:
To authenticate with Microsoft Family Safety, you need to obtain an authorization code.

**IMPORTANT: Copy this URL and open it in your browser:**

{auth_url}

After logging in, you will be redirected to a blank page. The URL of that page will contain a 'code' parameter.

Click Next when ready to enter the redirect URL.

auth.title: Enter Redirect URL
auth.description:
Paste the complete URL from your browser's address bar after logging in.

The URL should look like:
https://login.live.com/oauth20_desktop.srf?code=M.C123...

You can paste the entire URL - the code will be extracted automatically.

**Authentication URL (if needed again):**
{auth_url}

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Microsoft Family Safety
reauth_confirm.description:
Your authentication has expired. Please obtain a new authorization code:

1. Open this URL: {auth_url}
2. Log in with your Microsoft account
3. Copy the URL from the blank page that appears
4. Paste it below

error.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Please check the URL and try again.
error.token_expired: Your authentication has expired. Please reauthenticate.
error.no_redirect_url: Please enter a valid redirect URL.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
